General.Name: Huaibei Mining Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Huaibei Mining Holdings Co.,Ltd. primarily engages in coal mining, washing, processing, sales, and storage business in China. It operates through Coal, Coal Chemical Industry, and Merchandise Trading segments. The company offers coal products, including coking clean coal, natural coke, thermal coal, coalbed methane, etc. It also provides coal chemical products, such as coke, methanol, crude benzene, ammonium sulfate, tar, and refined benzene. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Huaibei, China. Huaibei Mining Holdings Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Huaibei Mining (Group) Company Limited.
